title: Lior Schunder Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Lior Schunder? Check out all of Lior Schunder's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogLior Schunder Director of User Acquisition Lior Schunder Lior is a seasoned digital marketing expert with over 10 years of experience in user acquisition - everything from paid search and social media advertising over search engine optimization (SEO), to strategic leadership. He has managed high-scale media budgets and tough KPI targets for leading global brands, relying on data-driven insights to fuel large-scale growth. Lior's passion for performance marketing, funnel optimization, and analytics fuels him to push forward and keep up with the latest developments and identify trends as early as possible.
